meanings.sent1: The boutique offers haute clothing for special occasions.
meanings.sent2: She always chooses haute restaurants for important celebrations.
meanings.sent3: The dog looked quite haute in his new bowtie.
meanings.sent4: Her artwork was as haute as a masterpiece in a gallery.
meanings.sent5: The mansion's interior design was the epitome of haute elegance.

meanings.sent1: The fashion show featured haute designs from top designers.
meanings.sent2: She felt confident and chic in her haute outfit.
meanings.sent3: Even the scarecrow in the field looked haute with its new hat.
meanings.sent4: His dance moves were as haute as a runway model's walk.
meanings.sent5: The sunglasses added a touch of haute to her overall look.

meanings.sent1: The desert can be quite haute during the summer months.
meanings.sent2: The metal surface became haute to the touch under the sun.
meanings.sent3: The spicy chili made his mouth feel haute.
meanings.sent4: The heat of the bonfire was as haute as a blazing sun.
meanings.sent5: The sauna provided a truly haute experience for relaxation.
